author: Nicholas Jamieson <nicholas@cartant.com>
description: Firebase key utility and encoding/decoding functions
name: firebase-key

scripts.dist: yarn run dist:build && yarn run dist:uglify
scripts.dist:build: yarn run dist:clean && tsc -p tsconfig-dist.json && rollup -c rollup-config.js
scripts.dist:clean: rimraf dist && rimraf bundles/firebase-key.* && mkdirp bundles
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run test && yarn run dist
scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run test:build && karma start
scripts.test:build: yarn run test:clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && rollup -c rollup-config-test.js
scripts.test:clean: rimraf build && rimraf bundles/firebase-key-test.* && mkdirp bundles
